DOC.brief_summary: The project intend modify Functional Independence Measure ( FIM ) manual wheelchair user . It determine new measure well measure community independence manual wheelchair user FIM . During Phase 1 study use new measure determine whether home exercise program increase functional independence wheelchair user . In Phases II III study 120 manual wheelchair user participate test validate new measure test effectiveness therapeutic exercise . Subjects range age 20 79 yr . variety disability .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Performance Measures Manual Wheelchair Users
DOC.keyword: wheelchair , biomechanics , age , functional outcome , disability
